html:
Woe. The fourth of the six woes.

down. It is always"down" to Egypt, geographically and morally.

trust = confide. Hebrew. batah. App-69.

the Holy One of Israel. See note onIsaiah 1:4 .Psalms 71:22 .

neither seek the LORD. CompareIsaiah 30:2 . Reference to Pentateuch (Deuteronomy 17:16). App-92.

the LORD. Hebrew. Jehovah. (with "eth). App-4.
